description: Displaying messages and errors to your users in a Dancer2 application is not difficult, but writing the code is boring and tedious. Come and learn a quick and easy way to easily display messages and errors, both to your user and to sysadmins. At the same time, we'll deal with any exceptions and touch on translations.
title: LPW2015 Andrew Beverley -  ‎Dancer2 system logging
